value.stringValue: AND ( NOT($Setup.Bypass_Configuration__c.Opportunity_Process__c), OR ( ISCHANGED([Opportunity].AccountId ), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].Probability ), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].OwnerId ), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].Reseller__c ), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].Units__c ), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].SPM__c ), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].Customer_Requested_Ship_Date__c ) ) )

formulas.expression: AND ( NOT({!$Setup.Bypass_Configuration__c.Opportunity_Process__c}), OR ( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.AccountId} ), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Probability} ), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.OwnerId} ), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Reseller__c} ), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Units__c} ), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.SPM__c} ), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Customer_Requested_Ship_Date__c} ) ) )

value.stringValue: AND ( NOT ( $Setup.Bypass_Configuration__c.Opportunity_Process__c ), ISPICKVAL ( [Opportunity].StageName , 'Closed' ) , OR ( ISPICKVAL ( [Opportunity].Status__c , 'Lost' ) , ISPICKVAL ( [Opportunity].Status__c , 'Inactive' ) ), OR ( ISCHANGED ( [Opportunity].Status__c ) , ISCHANGED ( [Opportunity].StageName ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_21
formulas.expression: AND ( NOT ( {!$Setup.Bypass_Configuration__c.Opportunity_Process__c} ), ISPICKVAL ( {!myVariable_current.StageName} , 'Closed' ) , OR ( ISPICKVAL ( {!myVariable_current.Status__c} , 'Lost' ) , ISPICKVAL ( {!myVariable_current.Status__c} , 'Inactive' ) ), OR ( ISCHANGED ( {!myVariable_current.Status__c} ) , ISCHANGED ( {!myVariable_current.StageName} ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_27
